attributes.action: Enable supermarkets to employ staff to make deliveries 24hr a day during covid19
attributes.additional_details: To double the amount of deliveries able to be sent out at present. Also enable government local taxis / volunteers (with dbs check ?) to deliver also.
attributes.background: No delivery slots available for the next month

rejection.details:
The recruitment of delivery drivers and provision of delivery slots is a matter for individual retailers.

The Government has announced various measures to help supermarkets expand their capacity. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/supermarkets-to-join-forces-to-feed-the-nation
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
